  • horizontalFormControlLabel (function)
  • View page source

horizontalFormControlLabel (function) ∞

horizontalFormControlLabel(labelText='', forId=False, sideLabel=False, location='left')[source] ∞

set a horizontal form label

Key Arguments

  • labelText – the label text

  • forId – what is the label for (id of the associated object)?

Return

  • horizontalFormRowLabel – the horizontalFormRowLabel
